extendedInfo.description: From the creators of Ocean HD, My Beach, Christmas HD, Season Zen, and Celtic Garden comes a spooky 3D live wallpaper creation for Halloween - or any time you need a little scare.Creep towards a looming Haunted House on Halloween night. Tiptoe past glowering pumpkins and a mailbox with your own custom name or message. If you dare, slam the knocker attached to a nameplate with your name or message on it, and push the creaking door open. Explore a haunted house full of ghosts, flickering lights, paranormal activity, and many other surprises just waiting to leap out at you!Customize every part of the scene, create your own ghost using one of your photographs, and write your own custom message for the mailbox, door, and doorway. Choose your style of pumpkins, and decide if you want to see the inside or outside of the haunted house. You can also hide or show the items in the scene to decorate your haunted house for Halloween, making it as spooky or as fun as you like.This wallpaper is true 3D with hand-crafted artwork. Our wallpapers feature silky-smooth animations while conserving your battery life.Works great with phones, tablets, or any device that supports live wallpapers.Problems? Visit our Facebook page or email our support team with the model of your phone and a description of the problem.

reviews.title: Halloween changes
reviews.comment: Loved the Halloween changes. The purple lights(which are my favorite color), the witch flying across the moon, and the moon being really beautiful. Excellent LWP. Can\'t wait till next Halloween. Now gotta go and see about that Christmas LWP... :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Weather change
reviews.comment: Love it, though I wish it would cycle through the weather on it\'s own like it does in done of your other ones. same as the inside/outside. If you could say every 30min change to the other scene. Nice purple windows
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: I love this wallpaper! Our anniversary is the 31 October, so it is so nice to have the count down;) Also does not drain my battery. I have all the wallpapers from this creator, and love them all. Keen them koming:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb but...
reviews.comment: Gets boring pretty quick. Excellent ideas and loads of features though...  Looks cool
reviews.author: Krassimir Cavalerra

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: My favorite holiday. .. So many toggle options, fantastic graphics, what\'s not to love?? Gorgeous, spooky, silly, creepy - every aspect has been represented very well. Thank you!
reviews.author: Yvonne Gentile

reviews.title: Samsung3
reviews.comment: The best ,works as advertise picture is high def, and all the settings works as well on my   samsung 3. Very good job ...
reviews.author: ralph vega

reviews.title: 3D spooky goodness!! Battery Friendly.
reviews.comment: Reminds me of the Disney Haunted House :-) Less than 2% battery drain on my battery drain list in the system settings.  Love it!!  For those wanting to see the Halloween surprises just set your date to Halloween!  Having hard time changing it but there is always Christmas HD!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: You guys make the best live wps! Love these on Galaxy series phones, as well as with android mini pc, gracing my 50\" plasma (combined with app icon cleaner)
reviews.author: Mika markkanen

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: You guys should put more room in the haunted house and have a way to go to the grave yard also you guys should have live wallpapers for nascar, nhl, nba and nfl
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I wish it was Halloween all year long
reviews.comment: Love this awesome wallpaper. Made me So happy. So many extras and - oh, I didn\'t expect that - it was worth the money and more. Get this, if halloween is your fav holiday (candy, costumes, no relatives to deal with - the perfect holiday).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Enjoy My Beach wallpaper so much that I wanted this too. As with Beach, tremendous attention to detail and ability to personalize, esp with creating a ghost from an uploaded pic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome LWP
reviews.comment: By far the most fun LWP I\'ve seen.  Smooth with custom settings.  I\'m a ghost in my own house!
reviews.author: Don Beers

reviews.title: Thanks for the update
reviews.comment: Galaxy s3...still only works with auto pan setting.  Looking forward to next Halloween!  See you then:-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Halloween live wallpaper
reviews.comment: Best Halloween wallpaper especially how it changed on Halloween looks 100% better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Htc Vivid
reviews.comment: Awsome graphics except it drains my battery a lot in auto scan mode and for some reason ever so often it switched from outside view to inside view and I hate that! Why won\'t it keep my settings? Other than that Awsome background.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice work
reviews.comment: This is a great wall paper using it on my s3 and xperia s. The only problem I have is that in s3 the panning doesn\'t work properly if you guys can fix that then you will get a five star other then that it\'s a great wallpaper
reviews.author: shubham saboo

reviews.title: Perfect for Halloween
reviews.comment: Love it! Great customizations. Whoa the moon changed colors for Halloween. I love the little details. Thanks guys! Definitely using this app next October too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely amazing !!!
reviews.comment: I really feel this app worth the money I spend. The interactive features are cool. We can go indoor or outdoor by double-tapping on the screen, after setting the wallpaper. Also, its fun to set my own ghost photo inside the house... So, all in all thanks for making such a beautiful, scary app in this Halloween season...... Galaxy Nexus on JB 4.1.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!  Updates R AWESOME!!!
reviews.comment: Can adjust \'creepy\' factor to however you want. Now can go in or out by tapping screen! Add your own mantle pic, mess with pendulum clock, move pumpkins. Has \'stormy night\' setting. Put your own message over doorway. The changing pictures are awesome...love the touch features; now more of them! Love yalls wallpapers! This is why!!! SO COOL-am applauding right now!!!    (:      Update: LOVE the witch who flies in front of the cool harvest moon!
reviews.author: A Google User
